main event: On Feb 3, almost all Semarang residents witnessed a white object which suddenly appeared in the sky.
interesting points: The object appeared to be about the size of a star but larger,The object was seen moving, suddenly stopping, and then moving again, The object is still unidentified, This incident was reported to be seen by almost all residents of Semarang, The report states that there are insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: a white unidentified object in the sky
